snippet: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu significantly expanded his power, creating the broadest coalition government in recent memory.
abstract: Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu significantly expands his power by striking a deal with the opposition leader Shaul Mofaz, creating the largest and broadest coalition government in Israel in recent memory; observers now wonder what Netanyahu, long seen as a pragmatist and master political tactician, will do with that power now that he has been freed from the demands of more ideological factions within his coalition.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu significantly expanded his power, creating the broadest coalition government in recent memory.

headline.seo: Shaul Mofaz Agrees to Join Benjamin Netanyahu’s Coalition
headline.main: Master Tactician in Israel Adds Power in a Coalition Deal
headline.print_headline: Master Tactician in Israel Adds Power in a Deal
